description.value: You can use an action to afflict a creature with intense fatigue. Target one creature within 5 yards. Make an Intellect roll against the targetâ€™s Will. On a success, the target becomes confused and slowed (luck ends both). A creature immune to the asleep affliction ignores this effect. At level 3, you can target two creatures within the same Size 5 space. At level 7, you can target three creatures within the same Size 5 space. On a critical success, the target also falls prone.
